subject: [Radiance-general] open source radian
body:
Hi all!

I realized today's December 2nd, 2002!
Has Radiance been released under GPL, or not?

It seems that nothing has changed at radsite.lbl.gov ...

--
Francesco Anselmo
anselmo@dream.unipa.it
